title: The Best Guess
subtle: Informational Narrative (fiction), 592 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 530L
description: The Best Guess tells how friends in a neighborhood work together to try to win a contest. They research and chart data to find the best guess for the ice cream man's question: “What will be the first one-hundred-degree day of the year?” Illustrations and graphs support the text.
highFrequencyWords: bar graph, certain, column, data, degrees, guesses, scan, tally mark, temperature
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Quotation Marks                : Identify and understand the use of quotation marks
